examples: Operators of bars and restaurants, who hear the first-hand grumblings of customers on the boardwalk, tend to oppose the ordinance.

definition: a growling or reverberating noise : rumbling
examples: On a shorter timescale, researchers and governments are working together to detect the first grumblings of an earthquake and alert communities that might be affected.
Meanwhile, grumbling fans wondered why the new coach hadn't hired any Ohioans for his staff.

definition: making a low, heavy, rolling sound
examples: There was no sound, still, but the rushing river and the grumbling, looming storm.
